name: hivedav
tagline: A lightweight DAV server for syncing calendars contacts and files
description: HiveDAV is a lightweight DAV server for syncing calendars, contacts and files with CalDAV and CardDAV capable clients. It aims to be simple to deploy and maintain for self hosted personal or small office groupware setups.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync calendars across devices using the standard CalDAV protocol

features.title: Carddav Server
features.description: Share and sync contacts with CardDAV-compatible clients

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements suitable for small servers or Raspberry Pi

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Host calendars and contacts for multiple users with separate accounts

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep your calendar and contact data on your own infrastructure
